Topic.Title: Sorry to be a bother but having some problems

Posts.EditableText: Um, hi, I'm new here I'm really sorry to be a bother but can anybody help me here? I downloaded the program and it works fine most of the time but it randomly closes sometimes. And it closes all the time whenever I try to use the game control scripts like "end game by player win" and "end game by player lose". Help would be very appreciated.
